org.mechio.integration.animation_motion

Class AnimationJobFrameSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jflux.api.common.rk.playable.AbstractPlayable
      • org.mechio.integration.animation_motion.AnimationJobFrameSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jflux.api.common.rk.playable.Playable, org.mechio.api.animation.player.AnimationJob, org.mechio.api.motion.blending.FrameSource<org.mechio.api.motion.Robot.RobotPositionMap>

    public class AnimationJobFrameSource
extends org.jflux.api.common.rk.playable.AbstractPlayable
implements org.mechio.api.animation.player.AnimationJob, org.mechio.api.motion.blending.FrameSource<org.mechio.api.motion.Robot.RobotPositionMap>
    An implementation of an AnimationJob which expects to be queried for new positions as a FrameSource.
    Author:
    Matthew Stevenson
